title: I'm really sick of this game and how it keep judging my performance in solo queue on others
body:
I started playing league last year and ended season in silver, but man this season ohh boy now just one person is enough to ruin your whole game and make you lose lp endless.
Top or Mid or ADC or Jg, once they lose control and fed enemy ohh boy no matter how good you did you always lose cause of that.

My games all today either someone play Ez adc and just to get S on Ez , so he ignore us and keep farming jg all game then come at the end and cost us game cause their adc jinix did reach late game.
Like dude let's get S in ranked and screw other players cause of that, lost lp and moved on.


And then 3 times i get mid laner without map awareness, feeding his laner and cost us game cost me more lp even if i did well in top side.

Etc, etc , etc and worst of all i keep losing lp all day cause of that.

Honestly that is the worst game that judge people performance in "Solo/duo" on a team performance yet their "Solo" performance doesn't get in count , i already feel like quitting after one year of playing this game cause i keep dunked down in ranks and lp just cause players that want to try new champion in ranked, or get S and screw us over, or just don't care about game, or just don't care about the stupid meta.

replies.body: Honestly it is quite annoying. I've been getting a string of games where people feed, first time their champs and generally play like they're bronze. I've played ranked for several years and it's never been this bad, even the year with dynamic queue where I was waiting 10 minutes for a game. This season is so frustrating, people play anything bot and just dump on us while my team is still playing weak adcs. I'm so exhausted.

Play more games. Its a 5v5, unless youre playing hundreds of games each season of course everyone else's skill is going to determine your rank. Youre only 1 person out of 10. The idea isnt "if youre good youll solo carry and win all the games", its "if youre good youll win more on average than lose". Even if you lose 19/23 games now it doesnt matter when you win 30/33 games later (extreme unrealistic example to make a point)

But it just annoying, for like last 3 days i had amazing teams and i was doing decent as i was on winning streak of atleast 10+ games then i reach my promos 3 times and failed just due to sudden someone decide it good idea to go kat support or act as split pusher lux support leaving team in 4v5.
And yesterday oh my god, every mid laner i have either have no map awareness or doesn't know how some assassins work so they fed them badly even if i did amazing in top lane and did tp bot or mid , rekt their laner and shut them down still losing cause my team just know how to be aggresive and dead with out thinking just one mistake and it done for me.

> [{quoted}](name=ValiantKiller,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kogpTWGz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-24T21:12:38.175+0000)
>
> But it just annoying

That's how team games work. If you don't like that there's plenty of solo games out there!

"Im so sick of team performance being the deciding factor in this team game!"

Go play Street Fighter then.

To be honest, you CAN carry your team. I think that you should really focus on yourself because from what you stated about your mates, they are the reason you are not winning. I understand what you are saying and how tilting it might be, but Solo Queue is, imo, a good way to see what you really deserve if you play a good amount of game. I used to be B3 2 years ago. Now im plat 1, so close to diamond. 

You'll climb if you start to understand that sometime it's not your fault if you lose a game, just go to the next one AND don't tilt because of that game, we all get  people who sometimes go bad in lane or are on a bad streak. But it is also the same case for  the other team (someone with a 39% wr on the ennemy team). You don't get to choose with who you play. All you get to choose is if you want your team to affect the way you  play (if you tilt, you will probably lose the game (from my experience with the game)). 

Also, how can you say they want an S? Ez needs to farm a lot to get his core. Farming is way better than killing someone (more xp + gold) but after, it all comes to ''Macro'' plays. An adc can't farm all game. He also needs to fight when it's the time to. 

Finally, you might want to ask yourself ''What could have I done better this game to climb?'' in order to learn and be better. Idk if this can help you but have a nice day on the rift! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

First let's talk about that Ez part, we killed their team like 3 times atleast and we put 3 of them on 30 second Cd of death so we scream for ez come let's do baron please, he ignore us and stay in jungle farming both sides over and over like 3 times atleast ofcourse once the timer of game reached 35min the weak useless jinix hit her spike and start to rocket us to death costing us game even after we put her behind.

Second let's talk about carrying part, my problem is i mostly play top lane and i carry hard only when i play with wukong but wukong problem he isn't a great blind pick in top lane cause he could get shut down in lane phase so i tend go with my second main in blind pick which is urgot.
I tend to make amazing score with urgot almost in every game and shut down my laner for ever but sometime urgot isn't flexible champion that able to just go on their feed carries and destroy them to carry.
Yes i do tend sometime to win 1v3 as urgot but it not working for me, since you have more years in this game what you suggest to me ?
